```{r}
alpha <- 0.5
n_obs <- 100
mu <- 2
delta <- -mu
nu <-  1.5
sigma <- 2
sigma_eps <- 1

trueV <- ngme2::rig(n_obs, nu, nu) 
noise <- delta + mu*trueV + sigma * sqrt(trueV) * rnorm(n_obs)

trueW <- Reduce(function(x,y){y + alpha*x}, noise, accumulate = T)
Y <- trueW + rnorm(n_obs, mean=0, sd=sqrt(sigma_eps))

########### generate input list 

a_init <- 0.1
nu_init <- 2

df <- data.frame(y=Y, x=1:length(Y))
ngme(y ~ f(x, model="AR1", noise="NIG"), family="gaussian", data=df)
```
